content: The `InputOtp` component is used for entering one-time passwords. The number of segments is controlled by the `length` prop. It can also be used as a password field by setting `type='password'`.
Styling is controlled via `size`, `color`, `variant`, and `radius` props. The `allowedKeys` prop can be used to set a regex for permitted characters.
The component can be controlled using the `value` and `onValueChange` props. An `onComplete` event is fired when all segments are filled.
Key stylable slots include `base`, `wrapper`, `segment`, and `caret` for the typing indicator.
